name: @dyondo/infrastructure-cdk
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for Dyondo muliti-user blogging platform

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run lint && npm run test && echo 'Transpilling typescript...' && tsc
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning up...' && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf cdk.out
scripts.lint: echo 'Eslint checking code style...' && eslint lib/* test/* --ext .ts --fix
